standard: Use and interpret cd, ls, and pwd commands
Understand how to declare, assign, initialize variables
Understand relationship between variables and memory
Identify appropriate variable types: String, char, int, float, double
Name and use variables appropriately for a program
Understand and use String indexes and length
Understand how to use Scanner to take input from users
Understand how to take different data types from users
Understand and use the Boolean data type
Understand and use the logical operators !, &&, OR
Understand how to short-circuit boolean operators
Evaluate complex boolean expressions that involve logical and relational operators
Read and write code that branches using if, else if, and else statements
